summary: A lonely socialite masquerades as a maid and meets an unpretentious, plain-spoken cowboy who is unaware of her true identity.
cast: Gary Cooper|Merle Oberon|Patsy Kelly|Walter Brennan|Fuzzy Knight|Mabel Todd|Henry Kolker|Harry Davenport|Emma Dunn|Walter Walker|Berton Churchill|Charles Richman|Frederick Vogeding|Eddie Acuff|Murray Alper|Irving Bacon|Silver Tip Baker|Jack Baxley|Chris Willow Bird|Danny Borzage|Ed Brady|George Chandler|Steve Clemente|Iron Eyes Cody|Mabel Colcord|Charles Coleman|James Conaty|Edward Cooper|Curley Dresden|Sarah Edwards|Frank Ellis|Franklyn Farnum|Sam Garrett|William Gillis|Arthur Hoyt|Si Jenks|John Judd|Ethan Laidlaw|Mike Lally|Chief Many Treaties|Robert Middlemass|Edmund Mortimer|David Newell|Edgar Norton|Lee Phelps|Russ Powell|Tom Ricketts|Syd Saylor|Emmett Vogan|Ethel Wales|Blue Washington|Billy Wayne|Guy Wilkerson|Harry Wilson|Florence Wix|Hank Worden|William Worthington
keywords: cowboy trio|taming of the shrew|manipulative female|manipulative father|strained father daughter relationship
director: Directors: H.C. Potter (as H. C. Potter), Stuart Heisler (uncredited) | 1 more credit Â»
title: El vaquero y la dama
